lines: 1. Ntomanyeti ensa'Ker' Omonen' agoeha;Twarori' ebimanyererio ebinge;Twamanyire Ere nachiche,Korende ntomanyeti ensa.
Nachiche, Torende tobe ang'e,Nachiche, Omotoria haleluya;Nachiche, as' amare a Tata,Ko ntomanyeti ensa.
2. Borabu mboreo 's'abagotoreka,'Keene nker' as' ebuku ya Nyasae;'Ker'obobani bwaraga ng'a ngoch'are,Ko ntomanyeti ensa.
3. Torende, tosabe chitaya tochiokie,Tokor'emeremo goik' Omonen'ache;Natotere, togok'ere kagochicha,Ko ntomanyeti ensa.
